channel.title: [1.6.6] [Survival]Heaven Craft - | 24/7 | iConomy | No Lag | 24GB Ram |
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zbF6T.png[/img][img]http://res.public-craft.com/hb.php?ip=playhc.net&port=&on=OPTIONAL_ONLINE_IMAGE&off=OPTIONAL_OFFLINE_IMAGE[/img]
[size=x-large]IP:[/size][size=x-large]PLAYHC.NET[/size]
Server Specifications
-Intel® Core™ i7-920 Processor (2.66 GHz)
-24GB of DDR3 Memory (not all of it is allocated to the Minecraft server)
-The server itself is hosted in Germany with a 100Mbit connection (I'm in Australia and don't experience any lag)
-Max players cap of 40 (Will be increased at a later date)
Staff List
Owner : Renagade Co-Owner : - Admin: Shane (smnn) SuperMods:, Peter (Donbanaan), regularkid, Emily (iPro) Mods:GL0b1n,jessy80
Rules
-NO Lava flooding. -No spawning or duping items. -No hacks whatsoever. -No greifing. -No theft other than dead players. -Use common sense
Groups
Owner & Co-Owner Admins SuperMods Mods Donor VIP Trusted Default
How to Donate:
Visit Heavencraft.net for more information on donating
Plugins:
mcMMO Anti-Xray PortalStick WeatherGod Permissions CraftBook iCoLand World Edit World Guard LWC Citizens BigBrother
Support us? Put this into your Signature *
